overview: The contact page for Digital Experience Healthcare provides users with a form to reach out for inquiries or support, displays contact information, and includes success/error banners for form submission feedback. It features a responsive navigation bar, accessibility enhancements, and a theme toggle.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
interactions: Click skip link to jump to main content
Toggle dark/light mode via theme toggle button
Submit contact form and trigger success or error banners
data_flow: User inputs data into contact form fields
On success, success banner is shown and form resets
On failure, error banner is displayed with retry option
accessibility: ARIA roles for navigation and alerts
aria-labels on interactive elements (theme toggle, close buttons)
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content
Validate theme toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
Submit form with valid data and assert success banner visibility
Submit form with invalid data and assert error banner visibility
Ensure banners can be dismissed and hidden
Check all navbar links navigate correctly
Confirm ARIA attributes and roles are present and valid
Validate analytics events fire on key interactions
